name: Magnets! (kezia)
description:
Magnets! is a puzzle game where you play as two magnets solving puzzles through switching polarity effecting the environment and each other. Can be played single player or two player.

This build includes two levels.

Supports keyboard and gamepad controls.

NOTES:

  • MENU CAN ONLY BE USED WITH GAMEPAD AT THIS TIME
  • THE KEYBOARD CONTROLS ARE CONFIGURED FOR A WINDOWS KEYBOARD AT THIS TIME
